title: Why America Is Removing Thousands of Dams and Letting Rivers Run Free: Excerpt
description: After centuries of dam building, a nationwide movement to dismantle these aging barriers is showing how free-flowing rivers can restore ecosystems, improve safety, and reconnect people with nature.
